snippet: After more than a year of political turmoil punctuated by his admission of crack cocaine use and drunken escapades, Mayor Rob Ford of Toronto was admitted to a hospital on Wednesday.
abstract: Scandal-plagued Toronto Mayor Robert Ford is hospitalized with abdominal tumor.
lead_paragraph: After more than a year of political turmoil punctuated by his admission of crack cocaine use and drunken escapades, Mayor Rob Ford of Toronto was admitted to a hospital on Wednesday.

headline.main: Rob Ford, Toronto Mayor, in Hospital With an Abdominal Tumor
headline.print_headline: Toronto Mayor in Hospital With an Abdominal Tumor
